meanings.definition: A dish of stuffed grape leaves.
meanings.sent1: My mom made delicious dolmas for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone enjoyed the dolmas as appetizers.
meanings.sent3: The dolmas at the restaurant were so tasty, they made me dance in my seat.
meanings.sent4: The dolmas were like little surprises, each leaf holding a flavorful secret.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the dolmas filled the room, tempting everyone to try a bite.

meanings.sent1: We ordered two plates of dolmas for the table.
meanings.sent2: The dolmas were a hit at the potluck, disappearing quickly.
meanings.sent3: The dolmas on the menu outnumbered all other dishes, causing a grape leaf shortage.
meanings.sent4: In the land of dolmas, every meal is a celebration of stuffed goodness.
meanings.sent5: The dolmas sat proudly on the plate, a symbol of culinary craftsmanship.
